abstract: Former Navy contracting officer Paul Simpkins is arrested and charged with conspiracy to commit bribery in shipping scandal involving Malaysian businessman Leonard Francis.
lead_paragraph: Paul Simpkins, a former senior contracting officer for the Navy, was arrested Tuesday and charged with conspiracy to commit bribery in a scandal involving ship-supply contracts in the Pacific.

headline.main: Ex-Contractor Charged in Navy Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Ex-Contractor Charged in Navy Bribery Case

snippet: Paul Simpkins, a former senior contracting officer for the Navy, was arrested Tuesday and charged with conspiracy to commit bribery in a scandal involving ship-supply contracts in the Pacific.
